mapper.insert: insert into t_sys_role (id, role_name, is_deleted, gmt_create, create_by, gmt_modified, last_modified_by, version, ) values (#{id}, #{roleName}, #{isDeleted}, now(), #{createBy}, NOW(), #{createBy}, 0
mapper.update: update t_sys_role set role_name=#{roleName} where id=#{id}
mapper.select: select user_acct,user_name,sex,role_name from t_sys_user t join t_role_user_middle tru on t.id=tru.user_id left join t_sys_role tr on tru.role_id=tr.id;
mapper.update: update t_sys_role set is_deleted=#{isDeleted} where id=#{id}
